set.name: SON
set.longname: Return of the Revenge of the Son of the Terrorscope

card.name: The Best Bout Machine
card.text: Whenever another creature with haste or flash enters the battlefield under your control, put a cardio counter on The Best Bout Machine. Whenever The Best Bout Machine attacks, you draw X cards and each opponent loses X life, where X is the number of cardio counters on The Best Bout Machine.

card.name: Spatial Artiste
card.text: Whenever you cast an Interstellar spell, you may pay {X}, where X is that spell's mana value. If you do, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Grim Metropolis
card.text: Grim Metropolis enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may return target artifact you control with mana value 1 or greater to its owner's hand. When you do, untap Grim Metropolis. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

card.name: Gravitic Rupture
card.text: Gravitic Rupture enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may return target artifact you control with mana value 1 or greater to its owner's hand. When you do, untap Gravitic Rupture. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Fresh-Faced Rookie
card.text: Lifelink Remodulate 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Brass Mendicant
card.text: Remodulate 2 (This enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Federation Auxiliary
card.text: When Federation Auxiliary enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Derring-Do Heartthrob
card.text: During your turn, Derring-Do Heartthrob has first strike. Whenever you cast an Interstellar spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Fobosian Abductor
card.text: When Fobosian Abductor enters the battlefield, exile target artifact or creature an opponent controls until Fobosian Abductor leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Forlorn Shieldtron
card.text: Flying Whenever Forlorn Shieldtron attacks, target creature you control gains shielded until end of turn. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.)

card.name: Colossus Capsule
card.text: When Colossus Capsule enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Colossus Capsule leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Scramble, Scramble
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Break the Lightspeed Barrier
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Cosmic Brickhouse
card.text: Flying When Cosmic Brickhouse enters the battlefield, exile up to two target non-Angel creatures until Cosmic Brickhouse leaves the battlefield. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Robot artifact creature token.

card.name: Energize the Crystal Brain
card.text: Put target artifact card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Alloyed Oppressor
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Alloyed Oppressor. Remodulate 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Charioteer of the Gods
card.text: Vigilance, flying Whenever you cast an Interstellar spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Charioteer of the Gods.

card.name: Intrepid Cosmonaut
card.text: Vigilance When Intrepid Cosmonaut enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Skyscuttler Prototype
card.text: Flying {1}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Skyscuttler Prototype gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

card.name: Rambunctious Throggler
card.text: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped artifact you control: Tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Experimental Artillerist
card.text: Flash When Experimental Artillerist enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target blocking creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Molybdenum Mook
card.text: Double strike Remodulate 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Meat Processor
card.text: Flash Remodulate 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Superweapon Tester
card.text: Flying When Superweapon Tester enters the battlefield, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on Superweapon Tester. • Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Curious Colossus
card.text: When Curious Colossus enters the battlefield, return target artifact or Interstellar card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Giant Cryoparasite
card.text: When Giant Cryoparasite enters the battlefield, spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.) Giant Cryoparasite cant be blocked as long as you've encountered a phenomenon this turn.

card.name: Juke
card.text: Exile target artifact or creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: High-Altitude Catfight
card.text: Counter target spell. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.

card.name: The Edge of Authorized Space
card.text: Draw a card. Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: You're Not the Android I Married
card.text: Draw two cards. Create a 1/1 black and red Robot artifact creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Gaze Not Long Into the Orb
card.text: Enchant creature or artifact Enchanted permanent is a Treasure artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color," and it loses all other abilities.

card.name: Lost in Space
card.text: Target artifact or creature's owner puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library. Surveil 1. (To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Promethian Tinkin
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on Promethian Tinkin. • Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Consult the Dinoracle
card.text: Draw a card for each spell you've cast this turn. (Including this one.)

card.name: Drifting Cetecean
card.text: Vigilance, flying Whenever Drifting Cetecean deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. If you would draw a card other than the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, you may spacewar! instead. (To Spacewar!, encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Quarth, Academic Fraud
card.text: As long as Quarth, Academic Fraud is tapped, if an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

card.name: Gyblaxian Hunter
card.text: Gyblaxian Hunter can't be blocked by Aliens. When Gyblaxian Hunter enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card or Interstellar card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Hardboiled Hardware
card.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Hardboiled Hardware. Remodulate 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Pincertronic Astrobug
card.text: Flying Pincertronic Astrobug enters the battlefield tapped. When Pincertronic Astrobug dies, you may exile it. When you do, spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Burst with Brainpower
card.text: Draw three cards.

card.name: Basking in the Time Chair
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one into your graveyard.

card.name: Entangled by the Thrigulon
card.text: Counter target artifact, creature, or Interstellar spell. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Thirst for Knowledge
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

card.name: Abrupt Void
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target artifact spell. • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Bug Zapper
card.text: When Bug Zapper enters the battlefield, it opens a wormhole. (Exile an Interstellar card from your graveyard. When this becomes tapped on a later turn, you may cast the exiled card. You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Unmanned Crustation
card.text: Unmanned Crustation enters the battlefield with a menace counter on it. Remodulate 2 (This enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Remorseless Timecop
card.text: {1}{B}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Return Remorseless Timecop from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Super Trooper
card.text: Menace {2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Leering Graspulax
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice an artifact and/or a creature. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each permanent sacrificed this way. Menace

card.name: Read-Only Megasaur
card.text: When Read-Only Megasaur enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: A Lonely Place to Shut Down
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Fall into a Timehole
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Psychotronic Spasm
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Its controller discards a card.

card.name: Final Death
card.text: Exile target creature.

card.name: Return of the Revenge of the Son of the Terrorscope
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Return of the Revenge of the Son of the Terrorscope enters the battlefield, put up to two target creature cards from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control tapped. At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose life equal to the total power of creatures you control.

card.name: Cyclotronic Godmachine
card.text: Trample, menace At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. When you do, each opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice. Remodulate 5 (This enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Super-Fun Happy Ride
card.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Put a charge counter on Super-Fun Happy Ride. Activate only during your turn. {2}{B}, {T}, Remove X charge counters from Super-Fun Happy Ride: Exile target creature with mana value X.

card.name: Robot Smasher
card.text: When Robot Smasher dies, if it had counters on it, return it to the battlefield tapped at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Deathkill Murderbug
card.text: When Deathkill Murderbug dies during your turn, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Scuttling Annihilator
card.text: When Scuttling Annihilator enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices two creatures of their choice.

card.name: Recurring Adversary
card.text: Recurring Adversary can't block. You may cast Recurring Adversary from your graveyard by sacrificing an artifact in addition to paying its other costs.

card.name: Ultraviolet Ray-Beam
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice an artifact. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If the additional cost was paid, it enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the sacrificed artifact's mana value.

card.name: Yawning Maw of the Void
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If a creature an opponent controls would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Microscopic Mayhem
card.text: Creatures have base toughness 1.

card.name: Uh Oh
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Destroy target creature.

card.name: Domesticated Killbot
card.text: When Domesticated Killbot enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Federation Courier
card.text: Interstellar spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Carnival of the Robotrons
card.text: Create three 1/1 black and red Robot artifact creature tokens with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Cold-Blooded Thriller
card.text: Cold-Blooded Thriller has menace and haste as long as you've cast an Interstellar spell this turn.

card.name: Drifting Astrofoetus
card.text: When Drifting Astrofoetus enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. When you do, this creature deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Hellworld Tyrant
card.text: Reach When Hellworld Tyrant enters the battlefield, spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.) {1}{R}, Discard Hellworld Tyrant: Spacewar!

card.name: Kablammo
card.text: Kablammo deals 2 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle. If a creature or planeswalker dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Electronic Revelation
card.text: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Orbital Chaos
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Endless Trundletrain
card.text: When Endless Trundletrain enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to any target. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Murderization Engine
card.text: If an artifact source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals triple that damage to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Rrroooaaarrr
card.text: Choose one — • Damage can't be prevented this turn. Rrröööaaarrr deals 3 damage to each creature and to each battle you control. • Destroy all artifacts.

card.name: King of the Mechasaurs
card.text: Flying Ward—Discard a card. {1}{R}: King of the Mechasaurs gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Whenever King of the Mechasaurs attacks, if its power is 13 or greater, spacewar! nine times. (To Spacewar!, encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Careful Handling
card.text: Careful Handling deals X damage to any target. If X is 5 or more, spacewar! X times. (To Spacewar!, encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Asteroid Miner
card.text: Whenever a nontoken artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: New Barbarians of the Moon
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add {R}{R}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Poker Night with the Boys
card.text: Whenever you attack, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. When you do, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: If It Moves, Shoot It
card.text: If It Moves, Shoot It deals 2 damage to each nonartifact creature.

card.name: Gyblaxian Gambit
card.text: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Vengeance of the Skeletron
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Exile the top two cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Robotronic Annihilation
card.text: Robotronic Annihilation deals 4 damage to any target. The damage can't be prevented.

card.name: To Hold the World
card.text: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Buggular Explorer
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Buggular Explorer: Spacewar! Activate only as a sorcery. (To Spacewar!, encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Extradimensional Ravager
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature or pay {3}.

card.name: Robotronic Murderizer
card.text: Robotronic Murderizer enters the battlefield with a trample counter on it. Remodulate 2 (This enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Armored Helligator
card.text: Trample Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

card.name: Steel Brutalizer
card.text: Trample Remodulate 2 (This enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Bazooka Trooper
card.text: Vigilance, reach, trample

card.name: Bring a Knife to a Laser Fight
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: To Hunt a Cosmic Foe
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control or target battle. If the creature you don't control would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Insult the Living Planet
card.text: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Contemplate Mortality
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact, creature, or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Prismatic Pioneer
card.text: Whenever you tap a permanent for mana, add an additional X mana of any one color, where X is Prismatic Pioneer's power.

card.name: Omnivorous Voidwurm
card.text: Vigilance, trample Omnivorous Voidwurm enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever you encounter a phenomenon, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Omnivorous Voidwurm.

card.name: Into the Gene Tanks
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, this spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the sacrificed artifact's mana value. Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Menaced by the Cube
card.text: Destroy all artifacts, battles, and enchantments.

card.name: Ornery Tentaculon
card.text: Ornery Tentaculon costs {8} less to cast if there are eight or more counters among creatures you control.

card.name: Buggular Hive Ship
card.text: Whenever an artifact or creature enters the battlefield under your control or is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Buggular Hive Ship. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Spinal Braintree
card.text: Defender {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Furious Sasquatchular
card.text: When Furious Sasquatchular enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. When you do, exile target artifact, enchantment, or battle. Furious Sasquatchular can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Cosmos Warp
card.text: Destroy target noncreature permanent. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Verdant Decomposition
card.text: Exile target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.

card.name: We Could Have Been Lovers
card.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle. Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Astral Sommelier
card.text: When Astral Sommelier enters the battlefield, spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.) Whenever you encounter a phenomenon, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Fobosian Tax Evasion
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less.

card.name: Flash Byrn, Too Handsome to Die
card.text: Flash Byrn, Too Handsome to Die enters the battlefield with a haste counter, a vigilance counter, and a +1/+1 counter on it. If Flash Byrn would be destroyed while it has a counter on it, instead remove a counter from it at random and it phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Bitter End
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent.

card.name: Vortex of Time (Also Space)
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control opens a wormhole. (Exile an Interstellar card from your graveyard. When that creature becomes tapped on a later turn, you may cast the exiled card. You still pay its costs. If a creature is straddling several wormholes you may cast any number of those cards.)

card.name: Baby's First Killbot
card.text: Each other creature you control with remodulate enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. Remodulate 2 (This enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Them Dogs Keep On Barking
card.text: Create two 0/0 black Robot Ranger creature tokens with remodulate 1. (A creature with remodulate 1 enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Cosmic Zombicorn
card.text: Ward—Discard a card When Cosmic Zombicorn enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. When you do, it opens a wormhole. (Exile an Interstellar card from your graveyard. When this becomes tapped on a later turn, you may cast the exiled card. You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Galactic Jibbly
card.text: When Galactic Jibbly enters the battlefield, choose one — • Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. • Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Reckless Exobiologist
card.text: When Reckless Exobiologist enters the battlefield, distribute a +1/+1 counter, a flying counter, and a lifelink counter among creatures you control.

card.name: Cosmonarch Butterfly
card.text: Flying, deathtouch When Cosmonarch Butterfly enters the battlefield, it opens a wormhole. (Exile an Interstellar card from your graveyard. When this becomes tapped on a later turn, you may cast the exiled card. You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Fobosian Corpsetruct
card.text: When Fobosian Corpsetruct enters the battlefield or dies, each opponent loses 1 life, you gain 1 life, and you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Solemn Timechild
card.text: When Solemn Timechild deals combat damage to a player, spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Digitized Exploderance
card.text: Spacewar!, then spacewar! again. (To Spacewar!, encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Federation Fodder
card.text: Double strike When Federation Fodder enters the battlefield, it opens a wormhole. (Exile an Interstellar card from your graveyard. When this becomes tapped on a later turn, you may cast the exiled card. You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Professor of Robotronics
card.text: Vigilance When Professor of Robotronics enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a non-Scientist artifact. When do you, create two tokens that are copies of the sacrificed artifact. (If you sacrifice a creature with remodulate, you can't put those counters on the tokens. Handle your robots responsibly.)

card.name: Cyborgulus Navigator
card.text: Whenever you put one or more counters on creatures you control, you may pay 1 life. If you do, draw a card. Remodulate 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Balance Your Mindhammer
card.text: Return target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Balance Your Mindhammer deals damage equal to that card's mana value to up to one target creature, planeswalker, or battle.

card.name: Clean-Shaven Android
card.text: Whenever you encounter a phenomenon, put a +1/+1 counter on Clean-Shaven Android. It gains trample until end of turn. {8}: Spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Intergalactic Vice Squad
card.text: Vigilance Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each counter on it.

card.name: Pinpoint Ordinance
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {3} or sacrifice a creature. Destroy target nonland permanent.

card.name: Painframe Analyst
card.text: When Painframe Analyst enters the battlefield or dies, return up to one target artifact or creature card not named Painframe Analyst from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Grizzled Waspronaut
card.text: When Grizzled Waspronaut enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}. When you do, spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.) Whenever you encounter a phenomenon, draw a card and put a +1/+1 counter on Grizzled Waspronaut.

card.name: Life's True Porpoise
card.text: Draw two cards. Life's True Porpoise deals 2 damage to each opponent. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.") Whenever you encounter a phenomenon, you may return Life's True Porpoise from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Consign to a Crystal Tomb
card.text: Choose one — • Consign to a Crystal Tomb deals 3 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle. • Exile target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Orbital Pioneer
card.text: Flying When Orbital Pioneer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Mercurial Tinkin
card.text: When Mercurial Tinkin enters the battlefield, sacrifice an artifact unless you pay {2}. Mercurial Tinkin can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Debigulator Jar
card.text: Ward {3} (Whenever this permanent becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.) When Debigulator Jar enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Debigulator Jar leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Paradise Eight
card.text: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Strange New Reality
card.text: When you encounter Strange New Reality, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Lost Cosmonaut
card.text: Remodulate 3 (This enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Robotronic Ambassador
card.text: Ward {1} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.) Other Robots you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Hyperspace Mishap
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.

card.name: Death's Other Head
card.text: Flying Whenever you sacrifice an artifact or creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Death's Other Head. Crew 3

card.name: Command Center
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Command Center: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. When Command Center is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Children of Laser Gods
card.text: Non-Robot creatures have base power and toughness 1/1.

card.name: Moss-Covered Three-Handled Family Killbot
card.text: Moss-Covered Three-Handled Family Killbot enters the battlefield tapped with a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Abhor
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller creates a token that's a copy of it, except it's 2/2 and has decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Sanction
card.text: Exile target artifact or creature.

card.name: The Hammer Slammer
card.text: Trample, ward {4}, haste Whenever The Hammer Slammer attacks, defending player may sacrifice a permanent with mana value equal to or greater than The Hammer Slammer's power. If they do, put a +1/+1 counter on The Hammer Slammer and remove it from combat.

card.name: The Eternal Child
card.text: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many counters plus an addition counter of your choice from among +1/+1, flying, vigilance, or lifelink are put on it instead.

card.name: The Necropanzer
card.text: Artifacts you control have deathtouch. Whenever a nonartifact creature dies, create a 1/1 black and red Robot artifact creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: The Motorgeist
card.text: Robots and Vehicles you control have lifelink. Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on The Motorgeist.

card.name: Supermandroid
card.text: Supermandroid enters the battlefield with a flying counter on it. Remodulate 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, put its counters on another creature you control.)

card.name: Bridge to ... Somewhere
card.text: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: The Crescendo of Primodial Gods
card.text: When you encounter The Crescendo of Primodial Gods, exile up to two target nonland permanents, then return those to the battlefield under their owners' control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Engage the Hyperdrive Portal
card.text: When you encounter Engage the Hyperdrive Portal, exile any number of target cards from a single graveyard.

card.name: Witness the Cosmic Baby
card.text: When you encounter Witness the Cosmic Baby, up to one target creature has base power and toughness 5/5 until your next turn.

card.name: Behold the Secrets of Ancient Genes
card.text: When you encounter Behold the Secrets of Ancient Genes, put a genome counter on any number of target creatures. Those creatures gain all creature types. Then draw a card.

card.name: Nap the Infinite Nap
card.text: When you encounter Nap the Infinite Nap, return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Engage the Particle Collidoscope
card.text: When you encounter Engage the Particle Collidoscope, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: The Cycle of Cosmic Rebirth
card.text: When you encounter The Cycle of Cosmic Rebirth, you may discard up to three cards. When you do, draw that many cards.

card.name: Prepare to Traverse the Infinite Void
card.text: When you encounter Prepare to Traverse the Infinite Void, put a flying counter on each of up to two target creatures.

card.name: A Crash Course in Brain Surgery
card.text: When you encounter A Crash Course in Brain Surgery, each opponent discards a card, then each opponent who didn't discard a nonland card this way loses 3 life.

card.name: Unravel Some Vast Conspiracy
card.text: When you encounter Unravel Some Vast Conspiracy, exile the top card of each player's library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play one of those cards, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.

card.name: Invasion of the Robotrons
card.text: When you encounter Invasion of the Robotrons, create a 2/2 colorless Robot artifact creature token.

card.name: Gamma-Laser Space Beams from the Sky
card.text: When you encounter Gamma-Laser Space Beams from the Sky, create three tapped 1/1 black Alien creature tokens.

card.name: Experience Tetrahedal Fold-Space
card.text: When you encounter Experience Tetrahedal Fold-Space, double up to one target creature's power until end of turn.

card.name: A Slow Dance in the Gravity Well
card.text: When you encounter A Slow Dance in the Gravity Well, tap target nonland permanent you don't control and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: The Impossibility of Time Itself
card.text: When you encounter The Impossibility of Time Itself, return up to one target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Astral Phenomenon
card.text: Astral Phenomenon enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an artifact. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Brackish System
card.text: Brackish System enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an artifact. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Desolate Cluster
card.text: Desolate Cluster enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an artifact. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

card.name: Eldritch Expanse
card.text: Eldritch Expanse enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an artifact. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Extrasolar Climate
card.text: Extrasolar Climate enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an artifact. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Outré Architecture
card.text: Outré Architecture enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an artifact. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Research Outpost
card.text: Research Outpost enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an artifact. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Retrograde Station
card.text: Retrograde Station enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an artifact. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

card.name: Silicate Flow
card.text: Silicate Flow enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an artifact. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Uncaring Sun
card.text: Uncaring Sun enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an artifact. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Riders of the Hawk Wind
card.text: Menace, haste Whenever a creature you control dies, you lose 1 life, then spacewar! (Encounter the top card of your cosmic deck.)

card.name: Derelict Sprawl
card.text: Derelict Sprawl enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may return target artifact you control with mana value 1 or greater to its owner's hand. When you do, untap Derelict Sprawl. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

card.name: Timeless Folly
card.text: Timeless Folly enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may return target artifact you control with mana value 1 or greater to its owner's hand. When you do, untap Timeless Folly. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Eternal Pinnacle
card.text: Eternal Pinnacle enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, you may return target artifact you control with mana value 1 or greater to its owner's hand. When you do, untap Eternal Pinnacle. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Miss Universe (headliner promo)
card.text: Flying Creatures your opponents control are colorless Treasure artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color," and lose all other types and abilities.

card.name: Miss Universe
card.text: Flying Creatures your opponents control are colorless Treasure artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color," and lose all other types and abilities.
